title: Michael Klim admits it's difficult raising his 13-year-old daughter Stella
text:
He's an Olympic swimmer, former world record holder and skincare business owner.

But on Wednesday, Michael Klim admitted that raising his 13-year-old daughter Stella has been one of the most difficult jobs yet.

Speaking to 9Honey, the 42-year-old said: 'I think it's been the most challenging age to parent so far and it might even get worse.'

'It's been the most challenging age to parent': Olympic swimmer Michael Klim (pictured) has admitted that it's difficult raising his 13-year-old daughter Stella

'Stella looks probably close to 18, she's 5'11'. She has a lot of attention, not only from her appearance but she's talented in different areas,' he added.

Michael is also father to Frankie, eight, and son Rocco, 10, who he shares with his ex-wife Lindy Klim.

The former couple were married for 10 years before they split in 2016.

Candid: Michael explained that 'it's been the most challenging age to parent so far' (pictured Michael and Stella)

Lindy currently lives in Bali while Michael lives in Australia and as a result their three children divide their time between the two countries.

Although Lindy married British property developer Adam Ellis last year, the pair have developed a good relationship.

Last month, Michael shared a candid snap posing alongside his three children, Lindy and her second husband while celebrating Father's Day.

Family: Michael is also father to Frankie, eight, and son Rocco, 10, who he shares with his ex-wife Lindy Klim (pictured is Michael, his three children, Lindy's second husband Adam Ellis and their daughter Goldie, one)

He wrote: 'A somewhat chaotic but very fun Father’s Day lunch today, I wouldn’t have it any other way! Hope all you dads had a great day too!'

Michael dressed casually in black cuffed ankle pants and a white T-shirt, as he sat on a lounge beside his son Rocco at the Alila Seminyak resort in Bali.

His ex-wife Lindy was pictured on the far right with their daughter Frankie sitting on her lap while her eldest Stella posed next to her.

Meanwhile, Adam sat in between the pair while his daughter Goldie, one, who he shares with Lindy, stood across from him.
